languages.text: Узрев предательство Вольного Торговца, проктор Соломон Антар не удивился — он всегда рассчитывал на худшее и не доверял никому, кроме своего кибермастифа. Убедившись в правильности своего пути перед гибелью, Арбитес испытал мрачное удовлетворение. Пристрелив Глейто, чтобы не обрекать его на мучительную смерть или участь хуже, Соломон вышел против бывше{mf|го|ей} соратни{mf|ка|цы} и погиб, не успев нанести ни одного удара.

Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, preferring to end his companion's life himself over leaving him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could land a single blow.
languages.original_text: Узрев предательство Вольного Торговца, проктор Соломон Антар не удивился — он всегда рассчитывал на худшее и не доверял никому, кроме своего кибермастифа. Убедившись в правильности своего пути перед гибелью, Арбитес испытал мрачное удовлетворение. Пристрелив Глейто, чтобы не обрекать его на мучительную смерть или участь хуже, Соломон вышел против бывше{mf|го|ей} соратни{mf|ка|цы} и погиб, не успев нанести ни одного удара.

traits.locale_text: Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbites felt grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, rather than to leave him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could strike a single blow.

The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. languages.text: Der Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} war keine Überraschung für Proktor Solomorne Anthar, der immer vom Schlimmsten ausging und außer seinem Cyber-Mastiff niemandem vertraute. Der Arbitrator empfand eine grimmige Zufriedenheit, als seine letzten Augenblicke ihm den Beweis für die Richtigkeit seines gewählten Pfades bescherten. Nachdem er Glaito erschossen hatte, weil er es vorzog, das Leben seines Gefährten selbst zu beenden, anstatt ihn leidend sterben zu lassen oder einem noch schlimmeren Schicksal auszusetzen, stellte Solomorne sich seinem früheren Waffenkameraden und starb, bevor er auch nur einen einzigen Schlag landen konnte.
languages.original_text: Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, preferring to end his companion's life himself over leaving him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could land a single blow.

traits.locale_text: Der Verrat {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} war keine Überraschung für Proktor Solomorne Anthar, der immer vom Schlimmsten ausging und außer seinem Cyber-Mastiff niemandem vertraute. Der Arbitrator empfand eine grimmige Zufriedenheit, als seine letzten Augenblicke ihm den Beweis für die Richtigkeit seines gewählten Pfades bescherten. Nachdem er Glaito erschossen hatte, weil er es vorzog, das Leben seines Gefährten selbst zu beenden, anstatt ihn leidend sterben zu lassen oder einem noch schlimmeren Schicksal auszusetzen, stellte Solomorne sich seinem früheren Waffenkameraden und starb, bevor er auch nur einen einzigen Schlag landen konnte.

languages.text: Le proctor Solomorne Anthar ne fut pas surpris le moins du monde par la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, lui qui envisageait toujours le pire et ne faisait jamais confiance à personne, sauf à son cyber-mastiff. L'arbitrator éprouva une sinistre satisfaction à voir que ses derniers instants lui apportaient la preuve que la voie qu'il avait choisie était juste. Après avoir abattu Glaito, préférant mettre lui-même fin à la vie de son compagnon plutôt que de le voir agoniser dans la souffrance ou subir un sort pire encore, Solomorne fit face à son ancien compagnon d'armes et se laissa mourir avant même qu'il n'ait pu lui porter le moindre coup.
languages.original_text: Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, preferring to end his companion's life himself over leaving him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could land a single blow.

traits.locale_text: Le proctor Solomorne Anthar ne fut pas surpris le moins du monde par la trahison {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, lui qui envisageait toujours le pire et ne faisait jamais confiance à personne, sauf à son cyber-mastiff. L'arbitrator éprouva une sinistre satisfaction à voir que ses derniers instants lui apportaient la preuve que la voie qu'il avait choisie était juste. Après avoir abattu Glaito, préférant mettre lui-même fin à la vie de son compagnon plutôt que de le voir agoniser dans la souffrance ou subir un sort pire encore, Solomorne fit face à son ancien compagnon d'armes et se laissa mourir avant même qu'il n'ait pu lui porter le moindre coup.

languages.text: 尽管索罗蒙·安萨监察官亲眼见证了行商浪人的背叛行为，但他丝毫没有感到意外。他凡事都会设想最糟糕的结局，除了他的生化獒犬之外，他谁都不会相信。在人生最后的时刻，他感觉到了冰冷的满足感，因为这个结果证明了他的道路是正确的。索罗蒙射杀了格雷托，亲手结束了同伴的性命，不愿让它痛苦地死去，更不愿让它遭受更加可怕的命运。在这之后，索罗蒙亲自面对着曾经的战友，但还没来得及射出一颗子弹便命丧当场。
languages.original_text: Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, preferring to end his companion's life himself over leaving him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could land a single blow.

traits.locale_text: 尽管索罗蒙·安萨监察官亲眼见证了行商浪人的背叛行为，但他丝毫没有感到意外。他凡事都会设想最糟糕的结局，除了他的生化獒犬之外，他谁都不会相信。在人生最后的时刻，他感觉到了冰冷的满足感，因为这个结果证明了他的道路是正确的。索罗蒙射杀了格雷托，亲手结束了同伴的性命，不愿让它痛苦地死去，更不愿让它遭受更加可怕的命运。在这之后，索罗蒙亲自面对着曾经的战友，但还没来得及射出一颗子弹便命丧当场。

languages.text: La traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente no sorprendió al Procurador Solomorne Anthar, que siempre daba por supuesto lo peor y no confiaba en nadie, salvo en su cibermastín. El Arbitrator sintió una satisfacción siniestra en sus últimos momentos, al comprobar que el camino que había elegido era el correcto. Después de disparar a Glaito para ahorrarle una muerte agonizante o un destino aún peor, Solomorne se enfrentó a su antigu{mf|o|a} camarada y murió sin causarle el más mínimo rasguño.
languages.original_text: Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, preferring to end his companion's life himself over leaving him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could land a single blow.

traits.locale_text: La traición de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente no sorprendió al Procurador Solomorne Anthar, que siempre daba por supuesto lo peor y no confiaba en nadie, salvo en su cibermastín. El Arbitrator sintió una satisfacción siniestra en sus últimos momentos, al comprobar que el camino que había elegido era el correcto. Después de disparar a Glaito para ahorrarle una muerte agonizante o un destino aún peor, Solomorne se enfrentó a su antigu{mf|o|a} camarada y murió sin causarle el más mínimo rasguño.

languages.text: ローグトレーダーの裏切りを目の当たりにしても、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人は驚かなかった。彼は常に最悪を想定し、サイバーマスチフ以外の誰も信用していなかったからだ。アービトレイターは、最期の瞬間に自身の選んだ道が正しかったという証を得て、冷酷な満足感を覚えた。ソロモーンはグライトを射殺した。苦痛に満ちた死やさらに悲惨な運命に見舞われるよりも、自らの手で最期を与えることを選んだのだ。そして彼は、かつての戦友と対峙し、一撃を加える間もなく命を落とした。
languages.original_text: Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, preferring to end his companion's life himself over leaving him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could land a single blow.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの裏切りを目の当たりにしても、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人は驚かなかった。彼は常に最悪を想定し、サイバーマスチフ以外の誰も信用していなかったからだ。アービトレイターは、最期の瞬間に自身の選んだ道が正しかったという証を得て、冷酷な満足感を覚えた。ソロモーンはグライトを射殺した。苦痛に満ちた死やさらに悲惨な運命に見舞われるよりも、自らの手で最期を与えることを選んだのだ。そして彼は、かつての戦友と対峙し、一撃を加える間もなく命を落とした。

languages.text: Her daim en kötüsünü tahayyül eden ve siber mastifinden başka kimseye itimat etmeyen Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar, Hür Tacir'in ihanetine hiç mi hiç şaşırmadı. Yargıcı, yaşamının son anları kendi seçtiği yolun doğruluğuna bir kanıt teşkil ederken hazin bir kıvanç duydu. Glaito'yu vurduktan sonra yoldaşının azap içinde can vermesine ya da daha da beter bir kadere mahkûm olmasına razı gelmektense onun hayatına bizzat son vermeyi tercih eden Solomorne, eski silah arkadaşıyla yüzleşti ve tek bir darbe dahi indiremeden ruhunu teslim etti.
languages.original_text: Witnessing the Rogue Trader's treachery did not surprise Proctor Solomorne Anthar, who always assumed the worst and trusted no one save for his cyber-mastiff. The Arbitrator felt a grim satisfaction as his final moments brought him proof of the correctness of his chosen path. After shooting Glaito, preferring to end his companion's life himself over leaving him to die painfully or suffer an even worse fate, Solomorne faced his former comrade in arms, and died before he could land a single blow.

traits.locale_text: Her daim en kötüsünü tahayyül eden ve siber-mastifinden başka kimseye itimat etmeyen Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar, Hür Tacir'in ihaneti karşısında hiç mi hiç şaşırmadı. Yargıcı, yaşamının son anları kendi seçtiği yolun doğruluğuna bir kanıt teşkil ederken hazin bir kıvanç duydu. Glaito'yu vurduktan sonra yoldaşının azap içinde can vermesine ya da daha da beter bir kadere mahkûm olmasına razı gelmektense onun hayatına bizzat son vermeyi tercih eden Solomorne, eski silah arkadaşıyla yüzleşti ve tek bir darbe dahi indiremeden ruhunu teslim etti.
